name: All Below Kaiju Zaibatsu -Demo- [Full Game Out SOON!]
name_original: All Below Kaiju Zaibatsu -Demo- [Full Game Out SOON!]
description:
This Demo shows the first 20-25% of the entire story.

The FULL VERSION of the game will be released Mid to Late Summer 2022 for FREE in time for the Sun No Fes Game Jam.  

People who have played through the Demo will be given an option in the full game to skip to where the demo had left off if they do not want to playthrough the entire first 20% again.
